text:
mUqrddhAna#M diqvO a#raqtiM pRu#thiqvyA vai$SvAnaqramRuqtAya jAqtamaqgniM | 
kaqvi(gm) saqmrAjaq-mati#thiqM janA#nAmAqsannA pAtra#M janayanta dEqvAH || 
uqpaqyAqmagRu#hItO-&syaqgnayE$ tvA vaiSvAnaqrAya# dhruqvO#&si dhruqvakShi#ti 
rdhruqvANA$M dhruqvataqmO&cyu#tAnA-macyutaqkShitta#ma EqSha tEq yOni#raqgnayE$ tvA vaiSvAnaqrAya# || 14 
(mUqrddhAnaqM - pa~jca#tri(gm)Sat) (A13)
